body.p: Clinton County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Cumberland County, Kentucky, native. Son of William R. and Zilpha Huff Ferguson. Married to Ann Eliza Smith in 1843. Father of [unknown] Ferguson. Married to Martha Owens on July 23, 1848. Father of Ann Elizabeth Ferguson. Farmer in Clinton County in 1860. Commanded independent company of cavalry (C.S.A.). Found guilty of murder and being a guerrilla by a U.S. military commission in September 1865. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860. Executed October 20, 1865, in Nashville, TN.
